hanzi-su-wiki:
懸

Значения

Вешать; висеть

Мнемоника

Система 系 публичных казней до остановки сердца 心. Проводились в больших уездных 県 городах путём подвешивания вниз головой.

Варианты

悬
purpleculture_pinyin:
xuán
to hang or suspend; to worry; public announcement; unresolved; baseless; without foundation
повесить или подвесить; волноваться; публичное объявление; нерешенные; безосновательно; без фундамента
rtega_mnemonic:
懸懸RS
悬悬		hang, suspend, hoist, be hung
  • heart 心 sympathetic with a hung man 縣/县
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 悬)
Ideographic: Pride 心 in one's country 縣, expressed by a flag; 縣 also provides the pronunciation
purpleculture_examples:
懸掛 [ xuán guà ]: to suspend; to hang; (vehicle) suspension
懸念 [ xuán niàn ]: suspense in a movie, play etc; concern for sb's welfare
懸殊 [ xuán shū ]: widely different; large disparity
懸崖 [ xuán yá ]: precipice; overhanging cliff
懸賞 [ xuán shǎng ]: to offer a reward; bounty
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 縣 [ xiàn ] county, district, subdivision
    • 心 [ xīn ] heart; mind; soul
heisig_chinese_memo: The county has a change of heart and suspends all DNA research because of corruption.
heisig_constituent: suspend, prefecture, eye, fishhook, small, little, lineage, stick, drop, thread, spiderman, heart
koohiiStory1: The prefecture has suspended all DNA research for heart disease because of corruption. All involved will be suspended by their wrists.
koohiiStory2: There's a suspension bridge connecting one of the prefectures to the Japanese heartland. The supporting cables of the bridge actually look like DNA double-helices. That's Japan for you!
jp_example_words:
懸賞(けんしょう): offering prizes, winning, reward
一生懸命(いっしょうけんめい): as well as one can, as hard as one can
jp_readingExamples: 懸垂 (けんすい), 懸賞 (けんしょう), 懸命 (けんめい), 懸かる (か.かる), 懸ける (か.ける)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: In your prefecture, you come from a long lineage of people who share one heart. When the heart is passed on to the next in line, it flies out of their body, and suspends itself in the sky, for you to take.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: You see the suspended heart in the distance, and make your way towards it.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You arrive at the suspended heart. There in front of it, protecting it, is Ken (けん) the samurai.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: "I've protected this suspended heart for you, for you are next in the lineage to receive it." He grabs the heart and throws it into your body.
Ru_Meaning: state of suspension, hang, depend, consult, distant, far apart
Ru_Radicals: ノ, 小 (маленький), 幺 (короткая нить), 心 (сердце), 目 (глаз), 糸 (нить)
Ru_trainchinese:
xuán: (глаг/прил) висеть, вешать; не иметь решения, оставаться незаконченным; поднимать; (разг.) опасный
xuán: (графема) далеко друг от друга; публично объявлять; беспокоиться, тревожиться; воображать
Kanshudo_mnemonic: in the prefecture (縣) the heart (心) is hung
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The boy was stupid but teachers were okay with that.  It was only when they decided he had a bad heart that they suspended him from all of the schools in the county.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " heart " and " county ", the original meaning is hanging. "Guanzi·Mingfa": "Officials, the lives of the people are hanging."

" Overhang " can mean great disparity and big difference. "Xunzi‧ Tianlun": "The reason why the gentleman and the villain hang each other is in this ear."

" Hanging " can mean hanging high in the air. Han Sima Xiangru "Nagamen Fu": "Hanging the moon to reflect on oneself, and the clear night in the bridal chamber."

" Hanging " also means emptiness and lack. "Three Kingdoms·Weizhi·Wang Su Biography": "The food is hanging up and it is difficult to sustain, and the great taboo of the army is also practiced."

" Hanging " also describes towering and steep. Ming Xu Hongzu's "Xu Xiake's Travels‧Dian Traveling Diary Six": "From the lion forest to the west of Zhiqiling, you can see the Great West Hanging."

" Suspended " also means care and concern. Southern Song Yuan Shu's "Building a Music House Following Cao Zi's "White Horse"": "While this is a long-term plan, the heart is hanging in the world."

" Hanging " also refers to the distance. "The Book of the Wei-The Biography of Le Ling King Huer": "The Heng Dynasty Lu Xuan, the old capital has a heavy meaning, so Uncle Qu came to this post."

A rack for hanging instruments such as bells and chimes is also called " hanging ." "Eastern Views of the Han Dynasty-Biography of Liu Qiang, King of the East Sea": "The palace is set up with a hanging bell."

" Hang " can also be used as a quantifier. Wang Shizhen of the Qing Dynasty, "Chibei Ou Tan-Tan Gu Si-Dutch Tribute": "A large self-ringed bell, a large glazed lamp round, and a candlestick hanging."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " heart " and " county ", the original meaning is hanging.
humanum_full_description:
從「心」，「縣」聲，本義為吊掛。《管子‧明法》：「吏者，民之所懸命也。」

　　「懸」可指懸殊、差別大。《荀子‧天論》：「君子小人之所以相懸者，在此耳。」

　　「懸」可表示高掛在空中。漢司馬相如〈長門賦〉：「懸明月以自照兮，徂清夜於洞房。」

　　「懸」也表示空虛、匱乏。《三國志‧魏志‧王肅傳》：「糧懸而難繼，實行軍之大忌也。」

　　「懸」還形容高聳，陡峭。明徐弘祖《徐霞客游記‧滇游日記六》：「自獅林西陟其嶺，即可望見絕頂西懸。」

　　「懸」亦表示牽掛、掛念。南朝宋袁淑《效曹子建樂府〈白馬篇〉》：「嗟此務遠圖，心為四海懸。」

　　「懸」還指相距遙遠。《魏書‧樂陵王胡兒傳》：「恆代路懸，舊都意重，故屈叔父遠臨此任。」

　　懸掛鐘磬等樂器的架也稱為「懸」。《東觀漢記‧東海王劉彊傳》：「宮殿設鐘虡之懸。」

　　「懸」也可用作量詞。清王士禛《池北偶談‧談故四‧荷蘭貢物》：「大自鳴鐘一座，大琉璃燈一圓，聚耀燭臺一懸。」

Ideographic: Pride 心 in one's country 縣, expressed by a flag; 縣 also provides the pronunciation
  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 縣 [ xiàn ] county, district, subdivision
    • 心 [ xīn ] heart; mind; soul
①掛，吊在空中：懸垂。懸吊。懸梯。懸河。懸心。懸念(ａ．掛念；b．文藝作品對故事情節發展和人物今後命運的伏筆)。懸樑刺股。
②沒有着落，沒有結束：懸斷。懸案。懸而未決。
③距離遠：懸隔。懸殊。
④危險：懸崖。懸乎(“乎”讀輕聲)。
⑤公開提示：懸賞。

從「 心 」，「 縣 」聲，本義為吊掛。《管子‧明法》：「吏者，民之所懸命也。」 「 懸 」可指懸殊、差別大。《荀子‧天論》：「君子小人之所以相懸者，在此耳。」 「 懸 」可表示高掛在空中。漢司馬相如〈長門賦〉：「懸明月以自照兮，徂清夜於洞房。」 「 懸 」也表示空虛、匱乏。《三國志‧魏志‧王肅傳》：「糧懸而難繼，實行軍之大忌也。」 「 懸 」還形容高聳，陡峭。明徐弘祖《徐霞客游記‧滇游日記六》：「自獅林西陟其嶺，即可望見絕頂西懸。」 「 懸 」亦表示牽掛、掛念。南朝宋袁淑《效曹子建樂府〈白馬篇〉》：「嗟此務遠圖，心為四海懸。」 「 懸 」還指相距遙遠。《魏書‧樂陵王胡兒傳》：「恆代路懸，舊都意重，故屈叔父遠臨此任。」 懸掛鐘磬等樂器的架也稱為「 懸 」。《東觀漢記‧東海王劉彊傳》：「宮殿設鐘虡之懸。」 「 懸 」也可用作量詞。清王士禛《池北偶談‧談故四‧荷蘭貢物》：「大自鳴鐘一座，大琉璃燈一圓，聚耀燭臺一懸。」
From the sound of " heart" and " county", the original meaning is hanging. "Guanzi·Mingfa": "Officials, the lives of the people are hanging." " Overhang" can mean great disparity and big difference. "Xunzi‧ Tianlun": "The reason why the gentleman and the villain hang each other is in this ear." " Hanging" can mean hanging high in the air. Han Sima Xiangru "Nagamen Fu": "Hanging the moon to reflect on oneself, and the clear night in the bridal chamber." " Hanging" also means emptiness and lack. "Three Kingdoms·Weizhi·Wang Su Biography": "The food is hanging up and it is difficult to sustain, and the great taboo of the army is also practiced." " Hanging" also describes towering and steep. Ming Xu Hongzu's "Xu Xiake's Travels‧Dian Traveling Diary Six": "From the lion forest to the west of Zhiqiling, you can see the Great West Hanging." " Suspended" also means care and concern. Southern Song Yuan Shu's "Building a Music House Following Cao Zi's "White Horse"": "While this is a long-term plan, the heart is hanging in the world." " Hanging" also refers to the distance. "The Book of the Wei-The Biography of Le Ling King Huer": "The Heng Dynasty Lu Xuan, the old capital has a heavy meaning, so Uncle Qu came to this post." A rack for hanging instruments such as bells and chimes is also called " hanging." "Eastern Views of the Han Dynasty-Biography of Liu Qiang, King of the East Sea": "The palace is set up with a hanging bell." " Hang" can also be used as a quantifier. Wang Shizhen of the Qing Dynasty, "Chibei Ou Tan-Tan Gu Si-Dutch Tribute": "A large self-ringed bell, a large glazed lamp round, and a candlestick hanging."

懸字的基本解释

懸
xuán
见“悬”。

懸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xuán］
［《廣韻》胡涓切，平先，匣。］
“悬1”的繁体字。
(1)吊挂；系挂。
(2)特指上吊。
(3)谓高挂在空中。
(4)孤立，无所依傍。
(5)空虚，匮乏。
(6)形容高耸，陡峭。
(7)牵挂；挂念。
(8)悬殊；差别大。
(9)指相距遥远。
(10)久延不决。
(11)犹公布。
(12)称。参见“懸石程書”。
(13)凭空设想；揣测。
(14)诱惑。
(15)抬起，举起。
(16)先。参见“懸談”。
(17)危险。
(18)悬挂钟磬等乐器的架。
(19)引申为律吕、音乐。
(20)量词。

懸字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　懸； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页408第24
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?胡涓切，音泫。本作縣。【說文】繫也。或从心。【孟子】猶解倒懸。　又叶熒絹切，音院。【張衡·西京賦】後宮不移，樂不徙懸。門衞供帳，官以物辯。

懸字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
懸字的起名意思

暂无。

Hang
Basic explanation of words
Hang
xuán
See "hanging".
Hang
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xuán］
["Guangyun" Hu Juanqie, Pingxian, Xie. ]
"Hang 1" in traditional characters.
(1) Hang; tie hang.
(2) Specifically refers to hanging.
(3) Said to hang high in the air.
(4) Isolation and nowhere to rely on.
(5) Emptiness and lack.
(6) Describe towering and steep.
(7) Worry about; worry about.
(8) Great disparity; big difference.
(9) Refers to the distance.
(10) Long delay without decision.
(11) Still announced.
(12) Weigh. See "Book of Hanging Stones".
(13) Imagine out of thin air; speculate.
(14) Temptation.
(15) Lift up, lift up.
(16) First. See "Suspended Talk".
(17) Danger.
(18) A rack for hanging bells and other musical instruments.
(19) The extension is Lulu and Music.
(20) Quantifiers.
Hang
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　 Xuan; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 408-24
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Hu Juanqie, Yin Xuan. This is a county. [Said the text] Department also. Or from the heart. [Mencius] still hanging upside down.　Ye Ying cut the silk again, the Music Academy. [Zhang Heng·Xijing Fu] The harem does not move, and happiness does not move. The guard confessed to the account, but the official argued by matter.

xuán
вм. 悬
Radicals: 県, 系, 心  (prefecture, lineage, heart)
Meaning Mnemonic
In your prefecture, you come from a long lineage of people who share one heart. When the heart is passed on to the next in line, it flies out of their body, and suspends itself in the sky, for you to take.
You see the suspended heart in the distance, and make your way towards it.
Reading Mnemonic
You arrive at the suspended heart. There in front of it, protecting it, is Ken (けん) the samurai.
"I've protected this suspended heart for you, for you are next in the lineage to receive it." He grabs the heart and throws it into your body.
